articles.description: Some 899 New Yorkers received expired COVID-19 vaccine doses at a vaccination site in Times...
articles.content:
Some 899 New Yorkers received expired COVID-19 vaccine doses at a vaccination site in Times Square. 
The individuals, who received the Pfizer shots at the former NFL Experience building between June… [+1804 chars]
